scripts.deploy-test: graph codegen && graph deploy --product hosted-service gdev8317/eddx-avalanche-referrals-staging --deploy-key $(cat .access_token)
scripts.deploy-prod: graph codegen && graph deploy --product hosted-service eddx-io/eddx-avalanche-referrals
scripts.deploy-satsuma: graph deploy eddx-avalanche-referrals --version-label $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)-$(date '+%y%m%d%H%M%S')-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) --node https://app.satsuma.xyz/api/subgraphs/deploy --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --deploy-key $(cat .satsuma_token)
